CustomField.description: We may offer one or more packages (for example, "IB" or "IB for Lawyer Provisioning") for each product line (for example, "Integration Builder"). This field describes the overall product line.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: We may offer one or more packages (for example, "IB" or "IB for Lawyer Provisioning") for each product line (for example, "Integration Builder"). This field describes the overall product line.
CustomField.label: Product Line
